asteroids.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of ships.
    Author:
    Senne Gielen & Jeffrey Quicken

      • Ship

        public Ship(double x,
            double y,
            double xVelocity,
            double yVelocity,
            double radius,
            double orientation)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes a Ship with a given x-coordinate,y-coordinate,x-velocity,y-velocity,radius and orientation.
        Parameters:
        x - The initial X-coordinate of this ship.
        y - The initial Y-coordinate of this ship.
        xVelocity - The initial velocity in the X direction of this ship.
        yVelocity - The initial velocity in the Y direction of this ship.
        radius - The initial radius of this ship.
        orientation - The initial orientation of this ship.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Throws IllegalArgumentException if the x coordinate,y coordinate or the radius are not valid. |((!isValidPos(x)) || (!isValidPos(y)) || (!isValidRadius(radius)))

      • getDistanceBetween

        public double getDistanceBetween(Ship ship)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Calculates the distance between this ship and the given ship.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship between which the distance must be calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance in kilometers between the center of this ship and the center of the given ship. |result == Math.sqrt(Math.pow(this.getPosX()-ship.getPosX(),2)+ | Math.pow(this.getPosY()-ship.getPosY(), 2))-this.getRadius()-ship.getRadius()
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The ship doesn't exist. |(ship == null)

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(Ship ship)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Checks if this ship overlaps with a given ship.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship of which must be checked if it overlaps with this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the ship overlaps with the given ship or the given ship is equal to the given ship. |result == this.getDistanceBetween(ship)<=0
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The ship doesn't exist. |(ship == null)

      • getTimeToCollision

        public double getTimeToCollision(Ship ship)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the time when this ship and a given ship will collide.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship of which the collision time with this ship is calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns the time in seconds when this ship and the given ship will collide. Returns Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if the ships will never collide.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The ship doesn't exist. |(ship == null)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given ship overlaps with this ship. |this.overlaps(ship)

      • getCollisionPosition

        public double[] getCollisionPosition(Ship ship)
                              throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Calculates the coordinates (an array) where this ship and the given ship will collide.
        Parameters:
        ship - The ship of which the collision coordinates with this ship are calculated.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of the X and Y coordinate where this ship and the given ship will collide. Returns null if the ships will never collide. |if(this.getTimeToCollision(ship) == Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY) then (result == null) |else result == {(((this.getPosX()+deltaT*this.getVelX())*ship.getRadius())+(ship.getPosX()+deltaT*ship.getVelX())*this.getRadius())/(this.getRadius()+ship.getRadius()), (((this.getPosY()+deltaT*this.getVelY())*ship.getRadius())+(ship.getPosY()+deltaT*ship.getVelY())*this.getRadius())/(this.getRadius()+ship.getRadius())}
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The ship doesn't exist. |(ship == null)
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given ship overlaps with this ship. |this.overlaps(ship)
